name: Deadbots Tell No Tales
description:
Created for Global Game Jam 17 - Theme: Waves

Take on the role of captain in this aural adventure on the high seas. Sail upon the waves of the Atlantic using sound waves as your only controller via Amazon's Alexa. No hands? No literacy? No eyes? No problem. It can be played by anyone who can speak and understand English, and tolerate nonsense. Best of all: it utilizes the fastest dedicated graphics processor on the market - your imagination.

Code
Justin Acker
Chris Bonilla
Christina Goefron

Writing
Corinne Cohen
Veronica Grijalva

Veronica Grijalva
